# System Architecture for BikeShare Login/Registration System (Iteration 2)

## Tech Stack
- Backend: Java 23 + Spring Boot 3.x
- Frontend: Vue.js 3
- Database:  MySQL
- Authentication: JWT/OAuth/Session]
- Build Tools: Maven (Backend), NPM/Vite (Frontend)

## Architecture Layers (Choose at least 3)

### 1. UI Layer (Frontend - Vue.js)
**Description:** [Fill in - presentation layer responsibilities]
**Components:**
- [Fill in - login form component]
- [Fill in - registration form component]
- [Fill in - navigation component]
- [Fill in - other UI components]

**Package Structure:**
```
src/
├── components/
├── views/
├── router/
└── stores/
```

### 2. Application Layer (Spring Boot Controllers & Services)
**Description:** [Fill in - application services and controllers]
**Components:**
- Controllers: [Fill in - AuthController, UserController, etc.]
- Services: [Fill in - AuthService, UserService, etc.]
- DTOs: [Fill in - request/response objects]

**Package Structure:**
```
org.example.backend.
├── web.controller/
├── application.service/
└── web.dto/
```

### 3. Domain Layer
**Description:** [Fill in - core business logic and entities]
**Components:**
- Entities: [Fill in - User, Role, etc.]
- Repositories: [Fill in - UserRepository, etc.]
- Business Logic: [Fill in - validation rules, etc.]

**Package Structure:**
```
org.example.backend.domain.
├── model/
└── repository/
```

### 4. [Optional] Technical Services Layer
**Description:** [Fill in if using this layer]
**Components:**
- [Fill in - security configuration]
- [Fill in - JWT handling]
- [Fill in - database configuration]

### 5. [Optional] Infrastructure Layer
**Description:** [Fill in if using this layer]
**Components:**
- [Fill in - external integrations]
- [Fill in - persistence implementations]
